0.6.9.name: wordpress/wp-subdomains-revisited
0.6.9.description:
An updated modification of "WP Subdomains" 0.6.9 to make subdomains for Categories, Pages and Authors without or inside Multisite. The original description is at original plugin's page, but you MUST also read INSTRUCTIONS sections.

Works perfectly as CDNs, likewise with W3 Total Cache, to increase performances without any additional technical problems.

Features

  • Setup main categories as subdomains
  • Setup main pages as subdomains
  • Setup author archives as subdomains
  • Custom themes for each subdomains
  • Tie pages to categories
  • Contextual help screen
  • Widgets
  • Localization
